title: 022: Fearow
author: Chris Taylor
description:
Javelin missiles are dangerous; when they look like Fearow even more so, too bad he only eats ants. Magmar still sucks, but will he be usurped from his reign as the most buttfaced buttface – listen to this episode to find out. 

Hosts: [Chris](https://twitter.com/DaLiquidSword), [Aleksandar](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC56emXYp1pHXL2E9SLcYisw), [Ethan](https://twitter.com/SynSpawn), [Mark](https://www.twitch.tv/robobobatron)

For more episodes and the full ranking list visit [Magmar Sucks](http://www.magmarsucks.com) on the web.

For more on the Pokemon in this episode check out their [Bulbapedia page](http://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/Fearow_(Pok%C3%A9mon))
